## Comment.setBubbleSize() method

Size this comment's bubble.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | number | Width of the bubble. |
|  height | number | Height of the bubble. |
